Overview

If you're looking for a fun thing to do in Burlington County, then check out K1 Speed in Cinnaminson! K1 Speed is world-renown for their indoor go kart racing experience and there's reason for it.

Their all-electric go karts are imported from Italy are among the very fastest in the industry! Teens and adults who are at least 58" (4'10") tall can drive their Adult Karts which can go up to 45 miles per hour! And kids can get in the fun, too. Children who are at least 48" (4') tall can drive K1 Speed's Junior Karts which can go up to 20 miles per hour! And because this is an indoor karting center, any day is a good time for racing no matter what the weather is like outside!

Not interested in racing? No problem! K1 Speed also has an arcade with video games, prize machines and other attractions that are perfect for all ages!

And if you're planning a big event or party, K1 Speed should be at the top of your venue list! Their party packages include everything you need for a successful event, including racing, food, and time in a reserved party space.

See why millions across the country have experienced K1 Speed (including pro drivers from F1, IndyCar and NASCAR) and stop by their Cinnaminson location today!
